          <title>
            <string language="en">Direct currents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichstrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courants continus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Correntes diretas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correnti continue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμεσα ρεύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corrientes directas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show oscilloscope readings for positive direct currents (top), zero current (centre) and negative direct currents (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">batteries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centreline</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direct currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oscilloscopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen Oszillographmesswerte für 
positive Gleichstrom (Oberseite), null aktuelle (Mitte) und negative 
Gleichstrom (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes montrent des lectures 
d'oscilloscope pour les courants continus positifs (dessus), les 
courants continus actuels (centre) et négatifs zéro (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram leituras do osciloscópio 
para correntes diretas positivas (alto), as correntes diretas atuais 
(centro) e negativas zero (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi mostrano le letture 
dell'oscilloscopio per le correnti continue positive (parte 
superiore), le correnti continue correnti (centro) e negative zero 
(parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν τις αναγνώσεις 
παλμογράφων για τα θετικά άμεσα ρεύματα (κορυφή), μηδέν παρόντα
(κέντρο) και αρνητικά άμεσα ρεύματα (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran las lecturas del 
osciloscopio para las corrientes directas positivas (tapa), las 
corrientes directas actuales (centro) y negativas cero (fondo).</string>
          </description>
